casebody.data:
M. G. HAGLER et al., Appellants, v. Elliott CAGE, Bankrupt, Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. December 2, 1929. No. 5638. Geo. A. Byers, of Houston, Tex. .(A. C. Wood and Chas. F. Byers, both of Houston, Tex., on the brief), for appellants. Walter F. Brown, of Houston, Tex., for appellee.

Before WALKER, BRYAN, and FOSTER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

For reasons stated in the opinion rendered by the District Judge [In re Cage Cotton Co., 32 F.(2d) 533], the decree is affirmed.
